New Records: Cleveland set a franchise record for points in a quarter with 49 in the first
Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell opened the fourth quarter with a 3-pointer and scored Cleveland's first nine points of the period
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavs are the sixth team to go 14-0 and first since the Golden State Warriors opened 24-0 in 2015-16
Others: Cleveland's 14-game winning streak is the longest in the club's 55-year existence
The Cavs played without starting forward Evan Mobley
